sys_script_include.description: Script include for get user country name.
sys_script_include.name: CIRUtilsGetCountry

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_934036e01b6a2410d4bca977b04bcb63
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_fru_cir.CIRUtilsGetCountry</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Script include for get user country name.</description><name>CIRUtilsGetCountry</name><script><![CDATA[var CIRUtilsGetCountry = Class.create();
CIRUtilsGetCountry.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getCountry: function() {
        var user = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
        user.addQuery("sys_id", gs.getUserID());
        user.setLimit(1);
        user.query();
        if (user.next()) {
            return user.location.country;
        }
    },

    type: 'CIRUtilsGetCountry'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lopez-aznar@dxc.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-22 12:13:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>934036e01b6a2410d4bca977b04bcb63</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CIRUtilsGetCountry</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Corporate Incident Response" source="x_fru_cir">265c101f13ab44100b8670a76144b0a2</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Corporate Incident Response">265c101f13ab44100b8670a76144b0a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_934036e01b6a2410d4bca977b04bcb63</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lopez-aznar@dxc.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-22 12:13:08</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
